text: Vyacheslav Aleksandrovich Khrynin (; 10 August 1937 – 30 October 2021Умер легендарный советский баскетболист ) was a Russian basketball player. He played for the Soviet team, where he won a silver medal at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Vyacheslav Khrynin
